Topic.Title: Quest breaks when I add a topic

Posts.EditableText: when I added a topic to a character in quest, it became unusable. i couldn't even shut it down! help me!
Posts.HTML: when I added a topic to a character in quest, it became unusable. i couldn't even shut it down! help me!

Posts.EditableText: I think we probably need more info.  What did you add?  Did you get any error message?  You using online or offline version?
